text: Allotinus is a genus of butterflies in the family Lycaenidae. The genus was erected by Cajetan Felder and Rudolf Felder in 1865. The members (species) of this genus are found in the Indomalayan realm. Allotinus (Allotinus) major, male, Sulawesi; B - Allotinus (Fabitaras) taras, male, Thailand; C - Allotinus (Paragerydus) leogoron, female, Thailand ==Species== *Subgenus Allotinus **Allotinus agnolia Eliot, 1986 **Allotinus albifasciatus Eliot, 1980 **Allotinus fallax C.
